As a person who likes to single queue i just can not recommend this game. With friends and a team it's fun. Overall CS is the best first person shooter in my opinion. Just not enjoyable while playing alone.


Edit: Positive review! Game experience greatly improved rarly any hackers and games tend to be very close. Did not expect that great improvement!
